nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @return true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

nodes.documentation: @dev set the minimum price for a product.  Emit SetProductPrice when a price is set.
nodes.name: setProductPrice

nodes.documentation: @return true for funds received.  Emit a ReceivedFunds event.

getBalanceContract().return: the amount of funds that can be withdrawn.

getNPayments(address).return: the total that has been payed by an account.

getPaymentInfo(uint256).return: the address that payeed with the payment amount and what was payed for.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

receiveFunds(uint256).return: true for funds received.  Emit a ReceivedFunds event.

setProductPrice(uint256,uint256).details: set the minimum price for a product.  Emit SetProductPrice when a price is set.
